transcript_en:
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: If we have to connect now, let's do it.
Executive: Yes, let's do it now sir, because it will be better in this.
Customer: Senior people are also sitting, I will take them on the video call too.
Executive: It will be better.
Customer: See, I have sent you a mail to the registration mail ID.
Executive: Tell me the mail ID which is registered here sir.
Customer: It's there. DMM@
Executive: Yes.

(silence)

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes, sir, I'll share my screen with you.
Executive: Sir, it would be better if we talk on the call itself, in the same way we are talking on the video call.
Executive: Yes, yes, we can talk like this, not on video. Because then there will be noise, you do it like this, I showed you the screen share.

(silence)

Executive: Meaning we will talk on the call.
Customer: Yes, let's do it on the call, it's fine. Is there any problem with that?
Executive: No, no, there is no problem sir.
Customer: I was saying that since we are talking on the call, the senior people are also there. So, the senior people will also listen, otherwise only I will listen to you.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: So, where there is a need, I will take the call and transfer it. No problem. Okay, rest yes, rest navigate here.
Executive: Yes sir, you go to buyleads at the present time sir.
Customer: Look sir, I went to buyleads.
Executive: Here I am, sir, you close your screen, I will share my screen with you. Are you opening the profile?
Customer: Okay, turn it off.
Executive: I have to put the keyword, right? Okay, turn it off anyway.
Executive: Zoom it in a little bit. It's zoomed in too much.

Executive: See, this is here, the buyleads that we have present.
Executive: Like metal looping sheet, do we deal in this?
Customer: Which metal is this? Is it aluminum? First put aluminum, yes, put aluminum coil in it.
Customer: Put aluminum coil in the buylead above.

issues.problem: Customer needs assistance in using the BuyLeads feature and searching for specific product (aluminum coil).
issues.actionable_summary: Provide clear and concise instructions on how to effectively use the BuyLeads search functionality, including keyword optimization. Offer personalized training if needed.

issues.problem: Customer is unsure about the relevance of displayed BuyLeads (metal looping sheet) to their business.
issues.actionable_summary: Ensure the BuyLeads algorithm is accurately matching leads to the customer's product categories. Review and refine keyword targeting for improved lead relevance.

issues.problem: Executive initially hesitant about video call, potentially hindering effective screen sharing and guidance.
issues.actionable_summary: Train executives on effective remote support techniques, including video call etiquette and screen sharing best practices. Ensure they have the necessary tools and resources to provide comprehensive support.

upsell.upsell_reason: Customer is currently focused on learning the basic features. No immediate upsell opportunity is apparent.

call_summary: The customer is being guided by the executive on how to use the BuyLeads feature. The customer initially wanted a video call but the executive preferred a voice call. The customer is looking for aluminum coil buy leads.

key_insights: Customer requires basic training on using the platform's features.
Lead quality is a potential concern, requiring attention to keyword targeting and lead matching algorithms.
